name: Zao
description:
'''Zao''' was a [[progressive rock]]/[[Magma_(band)#Zeuhl|zeuhl]] band that was founded by two ex-members of [[Magma (band)|Magma]]: [[Yochk'o Seffer]] ([[saxophone]], [[clarinet]]) and [[Fran√ßois Cahen]] ([[piano]]). They were active from 1971 to 1994 and released six studio albums.

In 1976, Magma violinist [[Didier Lockwood]] also joined the band and appeared on their albums ''[[Kawana (album)|Kawana]]'' and ''Live!''.
